entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
